bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with xia li 下痢 , discharge with free-flux illness. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 15: 治痢下 久不瘥神驗方 , “Wondrously effective recipe to cure free-flux illness discharge that fails to heal over an extended period of time”. Li xu 裏虛 , interior depletion [3]
Alternative Names nei xu 內虛.

Pathological Condition brought forth by depletion weakness of qi and blood in the depots and palaces. Shang han lun 傷寒論 214: 明日又不大便，脈反微澀者，裏虛也，為難治 , “The next day, if there is again an inability to defecate, but the [movement in the] vessels is faint and rough, this is interior depletion . This is difficult to cure”.
